page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION.
page.content: Although Inkberrow is a commuter village there are plenty of leisure and recreational activities available for all age groups.Sporting activities are very popular at the present time.There are football and cricket teams for men and boys,and badminton is a favourite with adults.The village hall is available for this.There are three tennis courts at the village hall too.Many of the children go horse riding at the two riding schools.Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides are held regularly.The Parent-Teacher Association of the school hold discos and film nights for the children.There are numerous social evenings to raise money for the varios organizations.Facilities in the nearby towns are used for swimming and other sporting activities.
